meanings.sent1: The letter was sent in a stampless envelope.
meanings.sent2: She realized the postcard was stampless and needed to be fixed.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his stampless mail must have taken the scenic route.
meanings.sent4: The stampless package seemed to have lost its way in the postal system.
meanings.sent5: The stampless letter got lost in the sea of stamped envelopes.

meanings.sent1: The stampless parcel was returned to the sender.
meanings.sent2: They had to pay extra for the stampless package.
meanings.sent3: The stampless letter played hide and seek with the postman.
meanings.sent4: Her stampless invitation stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The stampless envelope looked like it had forgotten something important.
